summary: This is a 2019 email forwarding a 1998 protective order from Judge Chin in the case US v. Epstein, questioning if it involves the same Jeffrey Epstein and mentioning attorney Ivan Fisher. It suggests historical legal documents related to Epstein existed prior to his widely known cases.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the defendant in the 1998 case US v. Epstein referenced in the protective order attached to the email.

persons.name: Ivan Fisher
persons.context: Mentioned by name in the email, suggesting his involvement in the 1998 Epstein case.

persons.name: Judge Chin
persons.context: Issued the 1998 non-disclosure protective order in the case US v. Epstein.

connections.description: Implied connection as Fisher is mentioned in the context of the 1998 Epstein case, suggesting he may have been Epstein's attorney.
Judge Chin presided over and issued a protective order in the 1998 case US v. Epstein.

events.title: US v. Epstein Case and Protective Order
events.description: A legal case, US v. Epstein, resulted in a non-disclosure protective order issued by Judge Chin.

events.title: Email Forwarding 1998 Order
events.description: An email was sent forwarding the 1998 protective order and questioning if it involved the same Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: A 1998 case, US v. Epstein, resulted in a non-disclosure protective order issued by Judge Chin.
Attorney Ivan Fisher is mentioned in connection with this 1998 Epstein case.
The existence of this 1998 order was being discussed via email in 2019, indicating ongoing interest or investigation into Epstein's earlier legal history.
